Help Center

Learn how to use Cap Outro effectively

Getting Started

Create a Campaign

Start by creating a fundraising campaign with your target raise amount and sectors.

Import Investors

Upload your investor list via CSV or add investors manually.

Create Templates

Build email templates with personalization variables.

Build Sequences

Create multi-step outreach sequences with emails and follow-ups.

Track Pipeline

Move investors through your pipeline as conversations progress.
